name: K9 Squad
description:
K9 Squad is a video game developed for Android in 2016 and it was my first "commercial" game. 
You play as K1, a dog member of the K9 Squad, and you have to defeat so many cats as you can.
Roll to avoid the enemy projectils and shoot at the windows!

This game was developed on GameMaker Studio.

IMPORTANT / IMPORTANTE

This game was developed for Android Devices. You can play it on your PC, but the controllers are not specified on the Gameplay!

Roll: A - D
Shoot: Mouse right button

-----------------------------------------------

El juego fue desarrollado originalmente para Android. Si bien se puede jugar en PC los controles no están especificados durante el gameplay.

Esquivar: A - D
Disparar: Click derecho del mouse
